name: Lisel Garsveden
biography: Garsveden attended the Gothenburg School of Art, formerly Hovedskous målarskola in Gothenburg, Sweden, 1980-82; and later the School of Design and Crafts at the University of Gothenburg, 1983-88. Most recently, she began designing for Ikea; her works can be seen in public settings and have been shown in many exhibitions worldwide.
